description: Well Package - Simulates features such as wells that withdraw or inject water at a specified rate from individual cells

variables.name: COMMENT
variables.description: Optional comment lines at beginning of file.
variables.tooltip: Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments and ignored by MODFLOW.

datasets.description: Maximum number of wells and output unit

variables.name: Option
variables.description: Optional keyword 'AUXILIARY' followed by auxiliary variable names, and/or 'NOPRINT'.
variables.tooltip: AUXILIARY adds extra data columns. NOPRINT suppresses well list output. SPECIFY PHIRAMP sets the NWT head limit ramp.

variables.name: MXACTW
variables.description: Maximum number of wells in use during any stress period.
variables.tooltip: Maximum number of well entries that will be used simultaneously. Determines memory allocation.

variables.name: IWELCB
variables.description: Unit number for cell-by-cell flow terms. 0=no output, >0=write to this unit, <0=print to listing file.
variables.tooltip: If > 0, well flow terms saved to binary file. If < 0, printed to listing file. If 0, no output.

variables.name: ITMP
variables.description: Number of well entries for this stress period. <0 reuses previous period data.
variables.tooltip: If > 0, ITMP well entries follow. If 0, no wells active. If < 0, reuse the previous stress period's well data.

variables.name: NP
variables.description: Number of parameters active in this stress period.
variables.tooltip: Number of named parameters that are active during this stress period. Typically 0 if not using parameters.

variables.name: Layer
variables.tooltip: Layer containing the well screen. 1-based index.

variables.name: Row
variables.tooltip: Row location of the well. 1-based index.

variables.name: Column
variables.tooltip: Column location of the well. 1-based index.

variables.name: Q
variables.tooltip: Pumping rate for the well. Negative values indicate pumping (extraction). Positive values indicate injection.
